keywords: ['guitar song', 'pedal steel guitar', 'simple percussion', 'acoustic guitar', 'slow tempo', 'country song', 'instrumental', 'no voices', 'relaxing music']
caption: This song features a pedal steel guitar playing the main melody. This starts off with a slide to a high register followed by plucking low register strings. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat in common time. An acoustic guitar strums chords in the background. The bass guitar plays the root notes of the chords. This song is at a slow tempo. There are no voices in this song. This is an instrumental song with a Country feel. This song can be played in a coffee shop.
